Camera modules are not only applied to photography , but also motion sensing for postural control , which will propel the market .
In 2013 , the CMOS camera module market size attained approximately USD 13.7 billion , up 18.9 % from 2012 ; but in 2014 , it will shrink greatly , up merely 6.7 % to USD 14.6 billion .
The market competition became fiercer in 2013 , especially the price wars ; therefore , almost all of CMOS camera modules saw a decline of about 2 percentage points in gross margin .
